text: K49FC was a low-power Class A television station in Saint Louis, Missouri, broadcasting locally in analog on UHF channel 49. Founded July 9, 1990, the station was owned and operated by 3ABN. The station's license was cancelled by the Federal Communications Commission on April 8, 2014. ==External links== *3ABN official site * Category:Religious television stations in the United States Category:Three Angels Broadcasting Network Category:Television channels and stations established in 1990 49FC Category:Defunct terrestrial television stations in the United States Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2014 49FC
title: K49FC
